base_description: Rectangular, white cabinet with two doors.
part_description: Two doors with handles, two drawers on top, rectangular shape, medium size.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out above the doors, providing storage space. The doors open outward, revealing interior compartments. The handles facilitate easy opening and closing of both the drawers and doors.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or within a kitchen setup, allowing for storage of kitchenware or other items. People interact with it by opening the doors and drawers to access stored contents.
